mapper.insert: insert into T_TERM_CONFIG( TERM_NO ,KEY ,VALUE ,CREAT_TIME ,UPDATE_TIME ,CREAT_USER ,UPDATE_USER ,REMARK ) values( #{ termNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ value, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ creatTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ updateTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ creatUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update T_TERM_CONFIG

VALUE = #{ value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREAT_TIME = #{ creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{ updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREAT_USER = #{ creatUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_USER = #{ updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{ remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TERM_NO = #{ termNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
